messages.startupErr: An error occurred while starting the application. Please contact the developers of Prism to resolve the issue.
messages.jreNotFoundErr: This application requires a Java Runtime Environment. (ERR_NOT_FOUND) Please install JRE on your computer: https://www.java.com/en/download/
messages.jreVersionErr: This application requires a Java Runtime Environment. (ERR_JRE_VERSION) Please re-install JRE on your computer: https://www.java.com/en/download/
messages.launcherErr: The registry refers to a nonexistent Java Runtime Environment installation or the runtime is corrupted. Please re-install JRE on your computer: https://www.java.com/en/download/
messages.instanceAlreadyExistsMsg: An application instance is already running!
